LanguageData.Bullet_Lynx.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_Lynx.label: GD tactical pistol
LanguageData.GD_Lynx.description: A Greydale Defense "Lynx". Light and easy to use, ideal personal defense weapon. It use small-caliber, high-velocity armor-piercing plasteel tipped cartridge.
LanguageData.Bullet_ModularCarbine.label: carbine bullet
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.label: GD modular carbine
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This carbine model's light and compact design makes it suitable for security mission. It is a base platform of other MRS.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRC.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRC.label: GD modular rifle
LanguageData.GD_GRC.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. Because of its durable and simple design, this rifle model is very popular among remote colonies militia.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRM.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRM.label: GD modular DMR
LanguageData.GD_GRM.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This marksman rifle model is a great tool for precision fire support or hunting.
LanguageData.Bullet_GRS.label: bullet
LanguageData.GD_GRS.label: GD modular LMG
LanguageData.GD_GRS.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This LMG model is good for support troops with its unceasing bursts.
LanguageData.Bullet_Jaguar.label: grenade
LanguageData.GD_Jaguar.label: GD grenade launcher
LanguageData.GD_Jaguar.description: Designed by Greydale Defense, the "Jaguar" is a simple but effective indirect fire support weapon.
LanguageData.Bullet_Caracal.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_Caracal.label: GD HV SMG
LanguageData.GD_Caracal.description: The "Caracal" is a SMG that manufactured by Graydale Defence. It was designed for close assault and fires special small calibre high velocity cartridges that can penetrate armour.
